description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Trout & Red Capsicum Cream Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Trout & Red Capsicum Cream Wraps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill. Grill 2 seeded and quartered red capsicums, skin side up, for 7 minutes, or until blackened. Place in a plastic bag to cool, remove the charred skin, and slice into strips. Combine 150g goat’s cheese or cream cheese, grated zest of 1 lemon, black pepper, 15g chopped chervil, and 1 tsp creamed horseradish. Warm through 3 tortillas, one at a time. Spread with the cream and scatter with the pepper and 115g smoked salmon. Roll up, wrap, and chill. Cut on an angle to serve.
